page.title: 11A Hard days work - part 2
page.content: Normally we do scope,but Mrs.Catheral is'nt here,so we do Fletcher Maths. That's not too bad but sometimes it's horrible.At{11.55am}the bell goes for dinner.Our class goes in at 12.15.We have a tray and sometimes a choice of dinner,then outside to play.The bell goes at{1.25pm}-registration,then on Thursdays it's our Energy Topic.Sarah and I do a picture of a house with all electrical appliances.Mr.Gray reads us a story at{3.10pm}and after Alison rings the bell at{3.30pm.}I walk home the same way as I came.I get the key from my neighbour and watch TV.When my Dad comes home at{6}we have tea,which usually is a cob,and sometimes cereal. Rachel goes dancing and my Dad shops at Asda.I have an early bath about{ {7pm}then watch Street Hawk.At{9}my Mum sends me to bed,but I read for 3/4 hour(Naughty me!).At{10pm}lights off!
